author: Staff Reporter
text:
M. Krishnamurthy alias Murthy (56), personal assistant to Tourism Minister S.P. Shunmuganathan, has been arrested here on Wednesday on charge of cheating.

According to Assistant Superintendent of Police, Thoothukudi (Town), P. Arun Sakthi Kumar, Murthy, a resident of Vijayanarayanam, Tirunelveli had demanded a sum of Rs. 3 lakh from P. Kirubanantha Murugan (38), AIADMK panchayat secretary, with the promise of getting his wife a permanent job as a Lab Assistant in a school.

Six months ago, Murugan paid the money, but the promise was not kept and he claimed he was deceived by Murthy. Since, he could not get a job for his wife as promised, he demanded the money be returned.

Subsequently, Murthy refused to give back the money and abused Murugan after passing casteist remarks, the latter alleged.

Based on the complaint, police have filed a case against Murthy under Sections 420, 294 (b), 506 (i) of IPC and SC /ST Act.
title: Tourism Minister’s PA arrested on cheating charge
